job_tasks.phrase: Design, implement, and maintain a scalable, high-throughput back-end traffic and usage monitoring and analysis system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes traditional software engineering tasks focused on building and maintaining a system, which aligns with the definition of developing and integrating software.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to ensuring the high availability and reliability of DeepL's service even in the event of attacks
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring high availability and reliability are core software engineering responsibilities related to system robustness and maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate automatic blocking of malicious clients into all backend services
job_tasks.justification: This involves integrating a specific functionality (blocking malicious clients) into existing backend services, which is a software integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Incorporate advanced bot detection and fraud prevention technologies
job_tasks.justification: While the technologies might be AI-related, the task described is about incorporating them into the system, which falls under software development and integration.

soft_skills.justification: This phrase directly relates to communication and feedback, which are key components of collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback, and believe that leading with empathy makes us better together.
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions collaboration and communication skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Annual learning budget: because we never stop learning, we've set up an annual budget for your professional development-pick a learning path which contributes to your career development and we'll back you up.
soft_skills.justification: Highlights a commitment to continuous learning and professional development.

soft_skills.phrase: Monthly full-day hacking sessions: every month, we have Hack Fridays, where you can spend your time diving into a project you're passionate about and get the opportunity to work with other teams-we value your initiatives, impact, and creativity.
soft_skills.justification: Encourages initiative, creativity, and passion projects, aligning with innovation and ownership.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on backend software engineering tasks, such as designing, implementing, and maintaining systems, integrating features, and ensuring reliability. While it mentions 'advanced bot detection and fraud prevention technologies,' the core responsibility is the integration and maintenance of these systems within the backend, not the development or fine-tuning of AI models themselves. The technologies listed are primarily software development and MLOps tools, with no specific mention of LLMs, GenAI frameworks, or traditional ML model development tasks. Therefore, the role is classified as a Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about its responsibilities and technology stack. All tasks described fall squarely within traditional software engineering, with no indication of AI/ML model development or specialization. The technologies listed are also standard backend and MLOps tools. This clarity makes the classification straightforward and highly confident.
